BOSS: A person who oversees and directs the work of others; a supervisor.
CHOICE: An option; a decision; an opportunity to choose or select something.
DANDY: A man very concerned about his clothes and his appearance.
GROOVY: Of, pertaining to, or having grooves.
HYPE: Promotion or propaganda; especially exaggerated claims.
RIGHTEOUS: To make _________; specifically, to justify religiously, to absolve from sin.
SWELL: To become bigger, especially due to being engorged.
